name: Its Dicey
description:
It’s Dicey is a challenging, addictive and fun puzzle game. The main objective is to make the dice reach the end point by matching the dots on it, within the given number of steps mentioned. Keep collecting stars on your way to the end point to progress through the levels!

It’s Dicey has 8 Packs with more than two hundred levels. Each pack has a new visual theme along with exciting features at each level that make it even more challenging. Each puzzle has multiple solutions.... you have the freedom to choose!!!

The game is easy to play and difficult to master!

Features:

8 Packs with new game play features.

250+ challenging and fun levels.

Each Pack comes with a completely different theme.

No time restriction, play at your own pace.

Multiple achievements that keep challenging your puzzle solving abilities.

Simple, clean and soothing graphics for the eyes.

Each theme has a different background score.

Each pack made exciting with variations in levels and new challenges.
